mapper.select: select * from hireboard order by hb_idx desc limit #{start},#{perpage}
SELECT cm.cm_compname FROM hireboard hb JOIN companymember cm ON hb.cm_idx = cm.cm_idx WHERE hb.hb_idx = #{hb_idx};
SELECT cm.cm_filename FROM hireboard hb JOIN companymember cm ON hb.cm_idx = cm.cm_idx WHERE hb.hb_idx = #{hb_idx};
mapper.update: update hireboard set hb_readcount=hb_readcount+1 where hb_idx=#{hb_idx}
